ThinkerListDrawer.cs
1 
9 using System;
10 using UnityEngine;
11 using UnityEditor;
12 
13 namespace ColorShapeLinks.UnityApp
14 {
19  [CustomPropertyDrawer(typeof(ThinkerListAttribute))]
20  public class ThinkerListDrawer : PropertyDrawer
21  {
22 
35  public override void OnGUI(
36  Rect position, SerializedProperty property, GUIContent label)
37  {
38  // Get the PropertyAttribute for the property from the base class
39  // and convert it to a ThinkerListAttribute
40  ThinkerListAttribute thinkerList =
41  attribute as ThinkerListAttribute;
42 
43  // Get the known thinkers from the ThinkerListAttribute instance
44  string[] thinkerNamesList = thinkerList.Thinkers;
45 
46  // Get the index of the previously selected thinker
47  int index = Mathf.Max(
48  0, Array.IndexOf(thinkerNamesList, property.stringValue));
49 
50  // Update index in case it changed
51  index = EditorGUI.Popup(
52  position, property.displayName, index, thinkerNamesList);
53 
54  // Update selected thinker in case index changed
55  property.stringValue = thinkerNamesList[index];
56  }
57  }
58 }
